snippet: "Relatively Speaking," a comic triple bill by Woody Allen, Ethan Coen, and Elaine May, will close on Broadway at the end of January after 153 performances.
abstract: "Relatively Speaking," a comic triple bill by Woody Allen, Ethan Coen, and Elaine May, will close on Broadway at the end of January after 153 performances.
lead_paragraph: "Relatively Speaking," a triple bill of short comedies that marked Woody Allen's return to Broadway as a playwright after 30 years, will close on Jan. 29 after a total of 153 performances, the show's producers announced in a statement on Wednesday. A spokesman for the producers said that they expected to recoup their full investment by the time the show closes; the producers declined to provide that dollar amount.

headline.main: 'Relatively Speaking' to Close at the End of the Month
